question:
Which Indian Association has recently organized the 'Vigyan Yatra'?

Â
option4: Indian Association of the Cultivation of Science (IACS)
answer: Indian Association of the Cultivation of Science (IACS)
explanation: The Indian Association of the Cultivation of Science (IACS),Kolkata has recently organized the 'Vigyan Yatra'.'Vigyan Yatra' is a promotional activity of the India International Science Festival. It was held virtually.Under the 'Vigyan yatra',many mobile science exhibitions vans were flagged off.The motto behind this 'yatra' was to promote scientific temper and inculcate the culture of science among the masses.
